channel.title: Areas are messed up. Anyone know why?
channel.description:
Okay so here is the issue.. Whenever I type ::pk (brings me to my pking zone) It logs me out. And when I go to log back in (Still in the pk zone) it logs me right back out unless I type ::home really fast. If I use the other method (a portal) to go to the pk zone. It logs me out again. The place for ::pk logs you out instantly for being there.
Some of the players on my server are stuck because they can't get out of there..
I don't even know where to begin to fix this. I haven't been on in a week and players are telling me that this has been happening for a few days now. Anyone got any ideas on how to fix it?

item.title: Areas are messed up. Anyone know why?
item.dc:creator: @Songoty Songoty
item.description:
@Songoty wrote:

[quote=“Shady1Aftermath, post:9, topic:172544”]I only have like 6 of jad there…

I havent been on for a week… The jads were the for a while. I put them there like a month ago. People said that it just started happening yesterday.

…

BTW the server had ::jad the whole time to go to a jad… So that cant be the problem. And thats the only NPCs there.[/quote]
What area are you trying to use as your pk zone?

Read full topic
item.source: Areas are messed up. Anyone know why?

Just change the coords, obviously it’s a bad coord ID

item.title: Areas are messed up. Anyone know why?
item.dc:creator: @Carazon Carazon ™
item.description:
@Carazon wrote:

It might be that you have Objects that arent supported for your client, it doesnt notice it nd logs you out. Try not getting items from construction, unless you use the correct client.

Read full topic

item.title: Areas are messed up. Anyone know why?
item.dc:creator: @bl4ck_ra1nb0w bl4ck ra1nb0w
item.description:
@bl4ck_ra1nb0w wrote:

It’s because the area has an object or npc that the client doesn’t have models for or something. So it’s only option is to disconnect. Try removing some of the npcs there or any spawned objects.

Read full topic
